item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, March 19, 2025 at 4:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Make Ubuntu packages 90% faster by rebuilding them (188 points | 115 comments)

3. Apple restricts Pebble from being awesome with iPhones (1254 points | 776 comments)

14. Gnome / mutter triple buffering patch merged (24 points | 1 comment)

30. Block YouTube ads on AppleTV by decrypting and stripping ads from Profobuf (2022) (660 points | 397 comments)
